bug.author: Ogaday
bug.description:
I've been following the tutorial here, specifically my own dependency parsing and I've come across some unexpected behaviour, see <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/Ogaday/f06bf048f29a03598e90a263269cedc9>gist</denchmark-link> . On running I occasionally get a printed to the terminal after printing. The final statement in the gist raises an . I've had a brief look at the source, but I can't see the issue and thought I would share it while I look further. More info: <denchmark-code>spacy 0.100.7 py35_0 (conda) python 3.5.2 (conda) Ubuntu-Mate 16.04 Xenial Intel Core i3-5005U CPU @ 2GHz </denchmark-code>
Thanks for any advice.

comments.comment: Hi, Sorry for the delay getting to this. Could you update to 0.101.0, and try again? You'll need to do: pip install -U spacy==0.101.0 && python -m spacy.en.download --force If it's still a problem, report back?
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
